section.title: handle_llvm.h
section.programlisting: 00001 //==-- handle_llvm.h - Helper function for Clang fuzzers -------------------==// 00002 // 00003 // Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions. 00004 // See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information. 00005 // SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception 00006 // 00007 //===----------------------------------------------------------------------===// 00008 // 00009 // Defines HandleLLVM for use by the Clang fuzzers. 00010 // 00011 //===----------------------------------------------------------------------===// 00012 00013 #ifndef LLVM_CLANG_TOOLS_CLANG_FUZZER_HANDLE_LLVM_HANDLELLVM_H 00014 #define LLVM_CLANG_TOOLS_CLANG_FUZZER_HANDLE_LLVM_HANDLELLVM_H 00015 00016 #include <string> 00017 #include <vector> 00018 00019 namespace clang_fuzzer { 00020 void HandleLLVM(const std::string &S, 00021 const std::vector<const char *> &ExtraArgs); 00022 } // namespace clang_fuzzer 00023 00024 #endif
